001    package com.winupon.andframe.bigapple.cache.core;
002    
003    import java.io.BufferedWriter;
004    import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
005    import java.io.Closeable;
006    import java.io.EOFException;
007    import java.io.File;
008    import java.io.FileInputStream;
009    import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
010    import java.io.FileOutputStream;
011    import java.io.FilterOutputStream;
012    import java.io.IOException;
013    import java.io.InputStream;
014    import java.io.InputStreamReader;
015    import java.io.OutputStream;
016    import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
017    import java.io.Reader;
018    import java.io.StringWriter;
019    import java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException;
020    import java.io.Writer;
021    import java.nio.charset.Charset;
022    import java.util.ArrayList;
023    import java.util.Iterator;
024    import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
025    import java.util.Map;
026    import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
027    import java.util.concurrent.LinkedBlockingQueue;
028    import java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor;
029    import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
030    import java.util.regex.Matcher;
031    import java.util.regex.Pattern;
032    
033    import org.apache.http.protocol.HTTP;
034    
035    /**
036     * Android 4.1.1ä¸­çš„æœ¬åœ°ç¼“å­˜ï¼ˆbitmapæ¨¡å—ä¸­çš„ç¼“å­˜æ›´å¥½ç”¨ï¼Œæ‰©å±•äº†ç¼“å­˜è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´è®¾ç½®ï¼‰
037     * 
038     * @author xuan
039     * @version $Revision: 1.0 $, $Date: 2013-8-1 ä¸‹åˆ5:20:21 $
040     */
041    public final class LruDiskCache implements Closeable {
042        static final String JOURNAL_FILE = "journal";
043        static final String JOURNAL_FILE_TEMP = "journal.tmp";
044        static final String JOURNAL_FILE_BACKUP = "journal.bkp";
045    
046        static final String MAGIC = "libcore.io.DiskLruCache";
047        static final String VERSION_1 = "1";
048        static final long ANY_SEQUENCE_NUMBER = -1;
049        static final Pattern LEGAL_KEY_PATTERN = Pattern.compile("[a-z0-9_-]{1,64}");
050    
051        private static final String CLEAN = "CLEAN";
052        private static final String DIRTY = "DIRTY";
053        private static final String REMOVE = "REMOVE";
054        private static final String READ = "READ";
055    
056        /**
057         * ç£ç›˜ç¼“å­˜çš„æ—¥å¿—æ ¼å¼å¦‚ä¸? <br>
058         * libcore.io.DiskLruCache <br>
059         * 1 -----------ç£ç›˜ç¼“å­˜çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¿¡æ?br>
060         * 100 ---------åº”ç”¨çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¿¡æ?br>
061         * 2------------ç¼“å­˜çš„æ•°é‡?br>
062         * -------------ç©ºè¡Œ <br>
063         * CLEAN 3400330d1dfc7f3f7f4b8d4d803dfcf6 832 21054 <br>
064         * DIRTY 335c4c6028171cfddfbaae1a9c313c52 <br>
065         * CLEAN 335c4c6028171cfddfbaae1a9c313c52 3934 2342 <br>
066         * REMOVE 335c4c6028171cfddfbaae1a9c313c52 <br>
067         * DIRTY 1ab96a171faeeee38496d8b330771a7a <br>
068         * CLEAN 1ab96a171faeeee38496d8b330771a7a 1600 234 <br>
069         * READ 335c4c6028171cfddfbaae1a9c313c52 <br>
070         * READ 3400330d1dfc7f3f7f4b8d4d803dfcf6
071         * 
072         * 
073         * Each of the subsequent lines in the file is a record of the state of a cache entry. Each line contains
074         * space-separated values: a state, a key, and optional state-specific values. o DIRTY lines track that an entry is
075         * actively being created or updated. Every successful DIRTY action should be followed by a CLEAN or REMOVE action.
076         * DIRTY lines without a matching CLEAN or REMOVE indicate that temporary files may need to be deleted. o CLEAN
077         * lines track a cache entry that has been successfully published and may be read. A publish line is followed by the
078         * lengths of each of its values. o READ lines track accesses for LRU. o REMOVE lines track entries that have been
079         * deleted.
080         * 
081         * The journal file is appended to as cache operations occur. The journal may occasionally be compacted by dropping
082         * redundant lines. A temporary file named "journal.tmp" will be used during compaction; that file should be deleted
083         * if it exists when the cache is opened.
084         */
085    
086        private final File directory;// æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
087        private final File journalFile;// æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
088        private final File journalFileTmp;
089        private final File journalFileBackup;
090        private final int appVersion;
091        private long maxSize;
092        private final int valueCount;
093        private long size = 0;
094        private Writer journalWriter;
095        private final LinkedHashMap<String, Entry> lruEntries = new LinkedHashMap<String, Entry>(0, 0.75f, true);
096        private int redundantOpCount;
097    
098        // åŒºåˆ†è€çš„å’Œå½“å‰çš„å¿«ç…§ï¼Œæ¯ä¸?¸ªå®ä½“åœ¨æ¯æ¬¡ç¼–è¾‘è¢«committedæ—¶éƒ½è¢«èµ‹äºˆä¸€ä¸ªåºåˆ—å·ã€?ä¸?¸ªå¿«ç…§çš„åºåˆ—å·å¦‚æœä¸ç­‰äºentryçš„åºåˆ—å·é‚£å®ƒå°±æ˜¯åºŸå¼ƒçš„ã?
099        private long nextSequenceNumber = 0;
100    
101        final ThreadPoolExecutor executorService = new ThreadPoolExecutor(0, 1, 60L, TimeUnit.SECONDS,
102                new LinkedBlockingQueue<Runnable>());
103    
104        private final Callable<Void> cleanupCallable = new Callable<Void>() {
105            public Void call() throws Exception {
106                synchronized (LruDiskCache.this) {
107                    if (journalWriter == null) {
108                        return null; // Closed.
109                    }
110                    trimToSize();
111                    if (journalRebuildRequired()) {
112                        rebuildJournal();
113                        redundantOpCount = 0;
114                    }
115                }
116                return null;
117            }
118        };
119    
120        private LruDiskCache(File directory, int appVersion, int valueCount, long maxSize) {
121            this.directory = directory;
122            this.appVersion = appVersion;
123            this.valueCount = valueCount;
124            this.maxSize = maxSize;
125    
126            this.journalFile = new File(directory, JOURNAL_FILE);
127            this.journalFileTmp = new File(directory, JOURNAL_FILE_TEMP);
128            this.journalFileBackup = new File(directory, JOURNAL_FILE_BACKUP);
129        }
130    
131        /**
132         * æ‰“å¼€ç¼“å­˜ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨å°±åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸?     * 
133         * @param directory
134         *            ç¼“å­˜è·¯å¾„
135         * @param appVersion
136         *            åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºç‰ˆæœ¬
137         * @param valueCount
138         *            ç¼“å­˜æ•°é‡
139         * @param maxSize
140         *            ç¼“å­˜æœ?¤§å®¹é‡
141         * @return
142         * @throws IOException
143         */
144        public static LruDiskCache open(File directory, int appVersion, int valueCount, long maxSize) throws IOException {
145            if (maxSize <= 0) {
146                throw new IllegalArgumentException("maxSize <= 0");
147            }
148    
149            if (valueCount <= 0) {
150                throw new IllegalArgumentException("valueCount <= 0");
151            }
152    
153            // å¦‚æœå¤‡ä»½æ–‡ä»¶å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¯´æ˜ä¸Šä¸?¬¡åœ¨è®°å½•æ—¥å¿—çš„æ—¶å?å¼‚å¸¸é€?‡ºäº†ï¼Œæ‰?»¥æ¢å¤å¤‡ä»½æ–‡ä»¶
154            File backupFile = new File(directory, JOURNAL_FILE_BACKUP);
155            if (backupFile.exists()) {
156                File journalFile = new File(directory, JOURNAL_FILE);
157                // åˆ é™¤å¼‚å¸¸è®°å½•çš„æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»?            if (journalFile.exists()) {
158                    backupFile.delete();
159                }
160                else {
161                    // æ¢å¤å¤‡ä»½æ–‡ä»¶
162                    renameTo(backupFile, journalFile, false);
163                }
164            }
165    
166            // Prefer to pick up where we left off.
167            LruDiskCache cache = new LruDiskCache(directory, appVersion, valueCount, maxSize);
168            if (cache.journalFile.exists()) {
169                try {
170                    cache.readJournal();
171                    cache.processJournal();
172                    cache.journalWriter = new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(new FileOutputStream(cache.journalFile,
173                            true), HTTP.US_ASCII));
174                    return cache;
175                }
176                catch (IOException journalIsCorrupt) {
177                    System.out.println("DiskLruCache " + directory + " is corrupt: " + journalIsCorrupt.getMessage()
178                            + ", removing");
179                    cache.delete();
180                }
181            }
182    
183            // å¦‚æœæ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸?¬¡ï¼Œæ–°å»ºæ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»?        directory.mkdirs();
184            cache = new LruDiskCache(directory, appVersion, valueCount, maxSize);
185            cache.rebuildJournal();
186            return cache;
187        }
188    
189        // è¯»å–æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶
190        private void readJournal() throws IOException {
191            StrictLineReader reader = new StrictLineReader(new FileInputStream(journalFile));
192            try {
193                String magic = reader.readLine();
194                String version = reader.readLine();
195                String appVersionString = reader.readLine();
196                String valueCountString = reader.readLine();
197                String blank = reader.readLine();
198                if (!MAGIC.equals(magic) || !VERSION_1.equals(version)
199                        || !Integer.toString(appVersion).equals(appVersionString)
200                        || !Integer.toString(valueCount).equals(valueCountString) || !"".equals(blank)) {
201                    throw new IOException("unexpected journal header: [" + magic + ", " + version + ", " + valueCountString
202                            + ", " + blank + "]");
203                }
204    
205                int lineCount = 0;
206                while (true) {
207                    try {
208                        readJournalLine(reader.readLine());
209                        lineCount++;
210                    }
211                    catch (EOFException endOfJournal) {
212                        break;
213                    }
214                }
215                redundantOpCount = lineCount - lruEntries.size();
216            }
217            finally {
218                closeQuietly(reader);
219            }
220        }
221    
222        // è¯»å–æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶çš„æ¯ä¸?¡Œ
223        private void readJournalLine(String line) throws IOException {
224            int firstSpace = line.indexOf(' ');
225            if (firstSpace == -1) {
226                throw new IOException("unexpected journal line: " + line);
227            }
228    
229            int keyBegin = firstSpace + 1;
230            int secondSpace = line.indexOf(' ', keyBegin);
231            final String key;
232            if (secondSpace == -1) {
233                key = line.substring(keyBegin);
234                if (firstSpace == REMOVE.length() && line.startsWith(REMOVE)) {
235                    // REMOVEè®°å½•å¤„ç†
236                    lruEntries.remove(key);
237                    return;
238                }
239            }
240            else {
241                key = line.substring(keyBegin, secondSpace);
242            }
243    
244            Entry entry = lruEntries.get(key);
245            if (entry == null) {
246                entry = new Entry(key);
247                lruEntries.put(key, entry);
248            }
249    
250            if (secondSpace != -1 && firstSpace == CLEAN.length() && line.startsWith(CLEAN)) {
251                // CLEANè®°å½•å¤„ç†
252                String[] parts = line.substring(secondSpace + 1).split(" ");
253                entry.readable = true;
254                entry.currentEditor = null;
255                entry.setLengths(parts);
256            }
257            else if (secondSpace == -1 && firstSpace == DIRTY.length() && line.startsWith(DIRTY)) {
258                // DIRTYè®°å½•å¤„ç†
259                entry.currentEditor = new Editor(entry);
260            }
261            else if (secondSpace == -1 && firstSpace == READ.length() && line.startsWith(READ)) {
262                // DIRTYè®°å½•å¤„ç†
263                // This work was already done by calling lruEntries.get().
264            }
265            else {
266                throw new IOException("unexpected journal line: " + line);
267            }
268        }
269    
270        /**
271         * å¤„ç†æ—¥å¿—ï¼Œåˆ é™¤REMOVEæ ‡è®°çš„è®°å½?     * 
272         * @throws IOException
273         */
274        private void processJournal() throws IOException {
275            deleteIfExists(journalFileTmp);
276            for (Iterator<Entry> i = lruEntries.values().iterator(); i.hasNext();) {
277                Entry entry = i.next();
278                if (entry.currentEditor == null) {
279                    for (int t = 0; t < valueCount; t++) {
280                        size += entry.lengths[t];
281                    }
282                }
283                else {
284                    entry.currentEditor = null;
285                    for (int t = 0; t < valueCount; t++) {
286                        deleteIfExists(entry.getCleanFile(t));
287                        deleteIfExists(entry.getDirtyFile(t));
288                    }
289                    i.remove();
290                }
291            }
292        }
293    
294        /**
295         * åˆ›å»ºä¸?¸ªæ–°çš„åˆ æ‰å†—ä½™ä¿¡æ¯çš„æ—¥å¿—ã?æ›¿æ¢å½“å‰çš„æ—¥å¿?     * 
296         * @throws IOException
297         */
298        private synchronized void rebuildJournal() throws IOException {
299            if (journalWriter != null) {
300                journalWriter.close();
301            }
302    
303            Writer writer = new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(new FileOutputStream(journalFileTmp), HTTP.US_ASCII));
304            try {
305                writer.write(MAGIC);
306                writer.write("\n");
307                writer.write(VERSION_1);
308                writer.write("\n");
309                writer.write(Integer.toString(appVersion));
310                writer.write("\n");
311                writer.write(Integer.toString(valueCount));
312                writer.write("\n");
313                writer.write("\n");
314    
315                for (Entry entry : lruEntries.values()) {
316                    if (entry.currentEditor != null) {
317                        writer.write(DIRTY + ' ' + entry.key + '\n');
318                    }
319                    else {
320                        writer.write(CLEAN + ' ' + entry.key + entry.getLengths() + '\n');
321                    }
322                }
323            }
324            finally {
325                writer.close();
326            }
327    
328            if (journalFile.exists()) {
329                renameTo(journalFile, journalFileBackup, true);
330            }
331            renameTo(journalFileTmp, journalFile, false);
332            journalFileBackup.delete();
333    
334            journalWriter = new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(new FileOutputStream(journalFile, true),
335                    HTTP.US_ASCII));
336        }
337    
338        private static void deleteIfExists(File file) throws IOException {
339            if (file.exists() && !file.delete()) {
340                throw new IOException();
341            }
342        }
343    
344        private static void renameTo(File from, File to, boolean deleteDestination) throws IOException {
345            if (deleteDestination) {
346                deleteIfExists(to);
347            }
348            if (!from.renameTo(to)) {
349                throw new IOException();
350            }
351        }
352    
353        /**
354         * è¿”å›keyå¯¹åº”çš„entryçš„snapshotï¼Œå½“keyç›¸åº”çš„entryä¸å­˜åœ¨æˆ–è€…å½“å‰ä¸å¯è¯»æ—¶è¿”å›nullã€?br>
355         * å¦‚æœè¿”å›ç›¸åº”çš„å?ï¼Œå®ƒå°±ä¼šè¢«ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°LRUé˜Ÿåˆ—çš„å¤´éƒ¨ã?
356         * 
357         * @param key
358         * @return
359         * @throws IOException
360         */
361        public synchronized Snapshot get(String key) throws IOException {
362            checkNotClosed();
363            validateKey(key);
364            Entry entry = lruEntries.get(key);
365            if (entry == null) {
366                return null;
367            }
368    
369            if (!entry.readable) {
370                return null;
371            }
372    
373            // Open all streams eagerly to guarantee that we see a single published
374            // snapshot. If we opened streams lazily then the streams could come
375            // from different edits.
376            InputStream[] ins = new InputStream[valueCount];
377            try {
378                for (int i = 0; i < valueCount; i++) {
379                    ins[i] = new FileInputStream(entry.getCleanFile(i));
380                }
381            }
382            catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
383                // æ–‡ä»¶æ²¡æ‰¾åˆ°ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯è¢«åˆ é™¤äº†
384                for (int i = 0; i < valueCount; i++) {
385                    if (ins[i] != null) {
386                        closeQuietly(ins[i]);
387                    }
388                    else {
389                        break;
390                    }
391                }
392                return null;
393            }
394    
395            redundantOpCount++;
396            journalWriter.append(READ + ' ' + key + '\n');
397            if (journalRebuildRequired()) {
398                executorService.submit(cleanupCallable);
399            }
400    
401            return new Snapshot(key, entry.sequenceNumber, ins, entry.lengths);
402        }
403    
404        /**
405         * Returns an editor for the entry named {@code key}, or null if another edit is in progress.
406         */
407        public Editor edit(String key) throws IOException {
408            return edit(key, ANY_SEQUENCE_NUMBER);
409        }
410    
411        private synchronized Editor edit(String key, long expectedSequenceNumber) throws IOException {
412            checkNotClosed();
413            validateKey(key);
414            Entry entry = lruEntries.get(key);
415            if (expectedSequenceNumber != ANY_SEQUENCE_NUMBER
416                    && (entry == null || entry.sequenceNumber != expectedSequenceNumber)) {
417                return null; // Snapshot is stale.
418            }
419    
420            if (entry == null) {
421                entry = new Entry(key);
422                lruEntries.put(key, entry);
423            }
424            else if (entry.currentEditor != null) {
425                return null; // Another edit is in progress.
426            }
427    
428            Editor editor = new Editor(entry);
429            entry.currentEditor = editor;
430    
431            // Flush the journal before creating files to prevent file leaks.
432            journalWriter.write(DIRTY + ' ' + key + '\n');
433            journalWriter.flush();
434            return editor;
435        }
436    
437        public File getDirectory() {
438            return directory;
439        }
440    
441        public synchronized long getMaxSize() {
442            return maxSize;
443        }
444    
445        public synchronized void setMaxSize(long maxSize) {
446            this.maxSize = maxSize;
447            executorService.submit(cleanupCallable);
448        }
449    
450        public synchronized long size() {
451            return size;
452        }
453    
454        // æäº¤å®ŒæˆæŒ‡ä»¤
455        private synchronized void completeEdit(Editor editor, boolean success) throws IOException {
456            Entry entry = editor.entry;
457            if (entry.currentEditor != editor) {
458                throw new IllegalStateException();
459            }
460    
461            // If this edit is creating the entry for the first time, every index must have a value.
462            if (success && !entry.readable) {
463                for (int i = 0; i < valueCount; i++) {
464                    if (!editor.written[i]) {
465                        editor.abort();
466                        throw new IllegalStateException("Newly created entry didn't create value for index " + i);
467                    }
468                    if (!entry.getDirtyFile(i).exists()) {
469                        editor.abort();
470                        return;
471                    }
472                }
473            }
474    
475            for (int i = 0; i < valueCount; i++) {
476                File dirty = entry.getDirtyFile(i);
477                if (success) {
478                    if (dirty.exists()) {
479                        File clean = entry.getCleanFile(i);
480                        dirty.renameTo(clean);
481                        long oldLength = entry.lengths[i];
482                        long newLength = clean.length();
483                        entry.lengths[i] = newLength;
484                        size = size - oldLength + newLength;
485                    }
486                }
487                else {
488                    deleteIfExists(dirty);
489                }
490            }
491    
492            redundantOpCount++;
493            entry.currentEditor = null;
494            if (entry.readable | success) {
495                entry.readable = true;
496                journalWriter.write(CLEAN + ' ' + entry.key + entry.getLengths() + '\n');
497                if (success) {
498                    entry.sequenceNumber = nextSequenceNumber++;
499                }
500            }
501            else {
502                lruEntries.remove(entry.key);
503                journalWriter.write(REMOVE + ' ' + entry.key + '\n');
504            }
505            journalWriter.flush();
506    
507            if (size > maxSize || journalRebuildRequired()) {
508                executorService.submit(cleanupCallable);
509            }
510        }
511    
512        // é‡å»ºæ—¥å¿—
513        private boolean journalRebuildRequired() {
514            final int redundantOpCompactThreshold = 2000;
515            return redundantOpCount >= redundantOpCompactThreshold && redundantOpCount >= lruEntries.size();
516        }
517    
518        /**
519         * åˆ é™¤æŒ‡å®šç¼“å­˜ï¼Œä½†å®é™…åªæ˜¯åœ¨æ—¥å¿—ä¸­åšäº†ä¸?¸ªæ ‡å¿—ï¼Œå®é™…æ–‡ä»¶è¿˜æ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰åˆ é™¤çš„
520         * 
521         * @param key
522         * @return
523         * @throws IOException
524         */
525        public synchronized boolean remove(String key) throws IOException {
526            checkNotClosed();
527            validateKey(key);
528            Entry entry = lruEntries.get(key);
529            if (entry == null || entry.currentEditor != null) {
530                return false;
531            }
532    
533            for (int i = 0; i < valueCount; i++) {
534                File file = entry.getCleanFile(i);
535                if (file.exists() && !file.delete()) {
536                    throw new IOException("failed to delete " + file);
537                }
538                size -= entry.lengths[i];
539                entry.lengths[i] = 0;
540            }
541    
542            redundantOpCount++;
543            journalWriter.append(REMOVE + ' ' + key + '\n');
544            lruEntries.remove(key);
545    
546            if (journalRebuildRequired()) {
547                executorService.submit(cleanupCallable);
548            }
549    
550            return true;
551        }
552    
553        public synchronized boolean isClosed() {
554            return journalWriter == null;
555        }
556    
557        private void checkNotClosed() {
558            if (journalWriter == null) {
559                throw new IllegalStateException("cache is closed");
560            }
561        }
562    
563        /**
564         * å¼ºåˆ¶å°†ç¼“å†²åŒºå†…å®¹å†™å…¥
565         * 
566         * @throws IOException
567         */
568        public synchronized void flush() throws IOException {
569            checkNotClosed();
570            trimToSize();
571            journalWriter.flush();
572        }
573    
574        public synchronized void close() throws IOException {
575            if (journalWriter == null) {
576                return; // Already closed.
577            }
578    
579            for (Entry entry : new ArrayList<Entry>(lruEntries.values())) {
580                if (entry.currentEditor != null) {
581                    entry.currentEditor.abort();
582                }
583            }
584    
585            trimToSize();
586            journalWriter.close();
587            journalWriter = null;
588        }
589    
590        private void trimToSize() throws IOException {
591            while (size > maxSize) {
592                Map.Entry<String, Entry> toEvict = lruEntries.entrySet().iterator().next();
593                remove(toEvict.getKey());
594            }
595        }
596    
597        /**
598         * å…³é—­ç¼“å­˜ï¼Œç„¶ååˆ é™¤ç¼“å­˜ç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰ç¼“å­˜æ–‡ä»?     * 
599         * @throws IOException
600         */
601        public void delete() throws IOException {
602            close();
603            deleteContents(directory);
604        }
605    
606        private void validateKey(String key) {
607            Matcher matcher = LEGAL_KEY_PATTERN.matcher(key);
608            if (!matcher.matches()) {
609                throw new IllegalArgumentException("keys must match regex [a-z0-9_-]{1,64}: \"" + key + "\"");
610            }
611        }
612    
613        private static String inputStreamToString(InputStream in) throws IOException {
614            return readFully(new InputStreamReader(in, HTTP.UTF_8));
615        }
616    
617        /**
618         * ä¸?¸ªEntryçš„å¿«ç…§ï¼Œä¸?¸ªå¿«ç…§é‡Œé¢å¯ä»¥æ”¾å‡ ä¸ªæ–‡ä»?     * 
619         * @author xuan
620         * @version $Revision: 1.0 $, $Date: 2013-9-18 ä¸Šåˆ10:12:31 $
621         */
622        public final class Snapshot implements Closeable {
623            private final String key;
624            private final long sequenceNumber;
625            private final InputStream[] ins;
626            private final long[] lengths;
627    
628            private Snapshot(String key, long sequenceNumber, InputStream[] ins, long[] lengths) {
629                this.key = key;
630                this.sequenceNumber = sequenceNumber;
631                this.ins = ins;
632                this.lengths = lengths;
633            }
634    
635            /**
636             * ç”Ÿæˆè¿™ä¸ªå¿«ç…§çš„Editorå¯¹è±¡
637             * 
638             * @return
639             * @throws IOException
640             */
641            public Editor edit() throws IOException {
642                return LruDiskCache.this.edit(key, sequenceNumber);
643            }
644    
645            /**
646             * è·å–è¿™ä¸ªå¿«ç…§çš„æŒ‡å®šæ–‡ä»¶çš„è¾“å…¥æµ?         * 
647             * @param index
648             * @return
649             */
650            public InputStream getInputStream(int index) {
651                return ins[index];
652            }
653    
654            /**
655             * è¯»å–è¿™ä¸ªå¿«ç…§çš„æŒ‡å®šæ–‡ä»¶çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å†…å®?         * 
656             * @param index
657             * @return
658             * @throws IOException
659             */
660            public String getString(int index) throws IOException {
661                return inputStreamToString(getInputStream(index));
662            }
663    
664            /**
665             * è·å–è¿™ä¸ªå¿«ç…§çš„æŒ‡å®šæ–‡ä»¶çš„é•¿åº¦
666             * 
667             * @param index
668             * @return
669             */
670            public long getLength(int index) {
671                return lengths[index];
672            }
673    
674            public void close() {
675                for (InputStream in : ins) {
676                    closeQuietly(in);
677                }
678            }
679        }
680    
681        private static final OutputStream NULL_OUTPUT_STREAM = new OutputStream() {
682            @Override
683            public void write(int b) throws IOException {
684                // Eat all writes silently. Nom nom.
685            }
686        };
687    
688        /**
689         * æ“ä½œEntryçš„Editor
690         * 
691         * @author xuan
692         * @version $Revision: 1.0 $, $Date: 2013-8-20 ä¸‹åˆ7:31:44 $
693         */
694        public final class Editor {
695            private final Entry entry;
696            private final boolean[] written;
697            private boolean hasErrors;
698            private boolean committed;
699    
700            private Editor(Entry entry) {
701                this.entry = entry;
702                this.written = (entry.readable) ? null : new boolean[valueCount];
703            }
704    
705            /**
706             * è·å–ä¸?¸ªè¾“å…¥æµï¼Œå¾—åˆ°CLEANæŒ‡å‘æ–‡ä»¶
707             * 
708             * @param index
709             * @return
710             * @throws IOException
711             */
712            public InputStream newInputStream(int index) throws IOException {
713                synchronized (LruDiskCache.this) {
714                    if (entry.currentEditor != this) {
715                        throw new IllegalStateException();
716                    }
717    
718                    if (!entry.readable) {
719                        return null;
720                    }
721    
722                    try {
723                        return new FileInputStream(entry.getCleanFile(index));
724                    }
725                    catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
726                        return null;
727                    }
728                }
729            }
730    
731            public String getString(int index) throws IOException {
732                InputStream in = newInputStream(index);
733                return in != null ? inputStreamToString(in) : null;
734            }
735    
736            /**
737             * è·å–ä¸?¸ªè¾“å‡ºæµï¼Œä¸?ˆ¬æ˜¯å¾—åˆ°DIRTYæŒ‡å‘çš„æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæœºåˆ¶æ˜¯è¿™æ ·çš„ï¼Œå…ˆè¾“å‡ºåˆ°DIRTYæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œç­‰æäº¤äº†å†åˆ‡å­˜åˆ°CLEANæ–‡ä»¶
738             * 
739             * @param index
740             * @return
741             * @throws IOException
742             */
743            public OutputStream newOutputStream(int index) throws IOException {
744                synchronized (LruDiskCache.this) {
745                    if (entry.currentEditor != this) {
746                        throw new IllegalStateException();
747                    }
748    
749                    if (!entry.readable) {
750                        written[index] = true;
751                    }
752    
753                    File dirtyFile = entry.getDirtyFile(index);
754                    FileOutputStream outputStream;
755                    try {
756                        outputStream = new FileOutputStream(dirtyFile);
757                    }
758                    catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
759                        // Attempt to recreate the cache directory.
760                        directory.mkdirs();
761                        try {
762                            outputStream = new FileOutputStream(dirtyFile);
763                        }
764                        catch (FileNotFoundException e2) {
765                            // We are unable to recover. Silently eat the writes.
766                            return NULL_OUTPUT_STREAM;
767                        }
768                    }
769                    return new FaultHidingOutputStream(outputStream);
770                }
771            }
772    
773            public void set(int index, String value) throws IOException {
774                Writer writer = null;
775                try {
776                    writer = new OutputStreamWriter(newOutputStream(index), HTTP.UTF_8);
777                    writer.write(value);
778                }
779                finally {
780                    closeQuietly(writer);
781                }
782            }
783    
784            /**
785             * ç¡®è®¤ä¿å­˜
786             * 
787             * @throws IOException
788             */
789            public void commit() throws IOException {
790                if (hasErrors) {
791                    completeEdit(this, false);
792                    remove(entry.key); // The previous entry is stale.
793                }
794                else {
795                    completeEdit(this, true);
796                }
797                committed = true;
798            }
799    
800            /**
801             * å–æ¶ˆä¿å­˜
802             * 
803             * @throws IOException
804             */
805            public void abort() throws IOException {
806                completeEdit(this, false);
807            }
808    
809            /**
810             * å¦‚æœä¿å­˜ä¸æˆåŠŸå°±å–æ¶ˆ
811             */
812            public void abortUnlessCommitted() {
813                if (!committed) {
814                    try {
815                        abort();
816                    }
817                    catch (IOException ignored) {
818                    }
819                }
820            }
821    
822            /**
823             * è¿™ä¸ªæµå­˜åœ¨çš„æ„æ?æ˜¯ï¼Œå¦‚æœå†™å‡ºç°é”™è¯¯æ—¶ï¼Œé»˜é»˜çš„è®°å½•ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œè?ä¸æ˜¯è¦æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸?         * 
824             * @author xuan
825             * @version $Revision: 1.0 $, $Date: 2013-9-18 ä¸Šåˆ10:23:04 $
826             */
827            private class FaultHidingOutputStream extends FilterOutputStream {
828                private FaultHidingOutputStream(OutputStream out) {
829                    super(out);
830                }
831    
832                @Override
833                public void write(int oneByte) {
834                    try {
835                        out.write(oneByte);
836                    }
837                    catch (IOException e) {
838                        hasErrors = true;
839                    }
840                }
841    
842                @Override
843                public void write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int length) {
844                    try {
845                        out.write(buffer, offset, length);
846                    }
847                    catch (IOException e) {
848                        hasErrors = true;
849                    }
850                }
851    
852                @Override
853                public void close() {
854                    try {
855                        out.close();
856                    }
857                    catch (IOException e) {
858                        hasErrors = true;
859                    }
860                }
861    
862                @Override
863                public void flush() {
864                    try {
865                        out.flush();
866                    }
867                    catch (IOException e) {
868                        hasErrors = true;
869                    }
870                }
871            }
872        }
873    
874        /**
875         * ä¸?¸ªç¼“å­˜çš„å…·ä½“æ¡ç›®ï¼Œä¸?¸ªæ¡ç›®å¯èƒ½å¯ä»¥å­˜åœ¨å¤šä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶
876         * 
877         * @author xuan
878         * @version $Revision: 1.0 $, $Date: 2013-8-20 ä¸‹åˆ7:29:41 $
879         */
880        private final class Entry {
881            private final String key;
882            private final long[] lengths;
883    
884            private boolean readable;
885    
886            private Editor currentEditor;
887            private long sequenceNumber;
888    
889            private Entry(String key) {
890                this.key = key;
891                this.lengths = new long[valueCount];
892            }
893    
894            /**
895             * è·å–æ¡ç›®ä¸­å„ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶çš„é•¿åº¦
896             * 
897             * @return
898             * @throws IOException
899             */
900            public String getLengths() throws IOException {
901                StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();
902                for (long size : lengths) {
903                    result.append(' ').append(size);
904                }
905                return result.toString();
906            }
907    
908            /**
909             * è®¾ç½®å„ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶çš„é•¿åº?         * 
910             * @param strings
911             * @throws IOException
912             */
913            private void setLengths(String[] strings) throws IOException {
914                if (strings.length != valueCount) {
915                    throw invalidLengths(strings);
916                }
917    
918                try {
919                    for (int i = 0; i < strings.length; i++) {
920                        lengths[i] = Long.parseLong(strings[i]);
921                    }
922                }
923                catch (NumberFormatException e) {
924                    throw invalidLengths(strings);
925                }
926            }
927    
928            private IOException invalidLengths(String[] strings) throws IOException {
929                throw new IOException("unexpected journal line: " + java.util.Arrays.toString(strings));
930            }
931    
932            /**
933             * è·å–CLEANæŒ‡å‘çš„æ–‡ä»?         * 
934             * @param i
935             * @return
936             */
937            public File getCleanFile(int i) {
938                return new File(directory, key + "." + i);
939            }
940    
941            /**
942             * è·å–DIRTYæŒ‡å‘çš„æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä¸?ˆ¬åšä¸­é—´è¿‡æ¸?         * 
943             * @param i
944             * @return
945             */
946            public File getDirtyFile(int i) {
947                return new File(directory, key + "." + i + ".tmp");
948            }
949        }
950    
951        // å·¥å…·éƒ¨åˆ†
952        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
953        /**
954         * è¯»å–Readerä¸­çš„æ‰?œ‰
955         * 
956         * @param reader
957         * @return
958         * @throws IOException
959         */
960        private static String readFully(Reader reader) throws IOException {
961            try {
962                StringWriter writer = new StringWriter();
963                char[] buffer = new char[1024];
964                int count;
965                while ((count = reader.read(buffer)) != -1) {
966                    writer.write(buffer, 0, count);
967                }
968                return writer.toString();
969            }
970            finally {
971                reader.close();
972            }
973        }
974    
975        /**
976         * é€’å½’åˆ é™¤dirä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰æ–‡ä»?     * 
977         * @param dir
978         * @throws IOException
979         */
980        private static void deleteContents(File dir) throws IOException {
981            File[] files = dir.listFiles();
982            if (files == null) {
983                throw new IOException("not a readable directory: " + dir);
984            }
985    
986            for (File file : files) {
987                if (file.isDirectory()) {
988                    deleteContents(file);
989                }
990    
991                if (!file.delete()) {
992                    throw new IOException("failed to delete file: " + file);
993                }
994            }
995        }
996    
997        private static void closeQuietly(Closeable closeable) {
998            if (closeable != null) {
999                try {
1000                    closeable.close();
1001                }
1002                catch (RuntimeException rethrown) {
1003                    throw rethrown;
1004                }
1005                catch (Exception ignored) {
1006                }
1007            }
1008        }
1009    
1010        /**
1011         * æµçš„è¡Œè¯»å–å™¨
1012         * 
1013         * @author xuan
1014         * @version $Revision: 1.0 $, $Date: 2013-8-2 ä¸Šåˆ10:18:41 $
1015         */
1016        private class StrictLineReader implements Closeable {
1017            private static final byte CR = (byte) '\r';// å›è½¦
1018            private static final byte LF = (byte) '\n';// æ¢è¡Œ
1019    
1020            private final InputStream in;
1021            private final Charset charset = Charset.forName(HTTP.US_ASCII);
1022    
1023            // bufç”¨æ¥å­˜æ”¾ç¼“å­˜å­—èŠ‚ï¼Œä¸€èˆ?<=pos<=endï¼Œ[pos, end)ä¹‹é—´çš„æ•°æ®å¯è¯»å–
1024            // è¾“å…¥ç»“æŸæ—¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰ä¸€è¡Œæœªç»ˆæ­¢ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è®¾ç½®end=-1ï¼Œå¦åˆ™end == posï¼Œç¨‹åºæ„å¤–ç»ˆæ­¢æ—¶ï¼Œendæœ‰å¯èƒ½æ˜¯posæˆ–è?-1
1025            private byte[] buf;
1026            private int pos;
1027            private int end;
1028    
1029            public StrictLineReader(InputStream in) {
1030                this(in, 8192);
1031            }
1032    
1033            public StrictLineReader(InputStream in, int capacity) {
1034                if (in == null) {
1035                    throw new NullPointerException();
1036                }
1037    
1038                if (capacity < 0) {
1039                    throw new IllegalArgumentException("capacity <= 0");
1040                }
1041    
1042                this.in = in;
1043                buf = new byte[capacity];
1044            }
1045    
1046            /**
1047             * å…³é—­è¡Œè¯»å–å™¨
1048             */
1049            public void close() throws IOException {
1050                synchronized (in) {
1051                    if (buf != null) {
1052                        buf = null;
1053                        in.close();
1054                    }
1055                }
1056            }
1057    
1058            /**
1059             * è¯»å–è¡?         * 
1060             * @return
1061             * @throws IOException
1062             */
1063            public String readLine() throws IOException {
1064                synchronized (in) {
1065                    if (buf == null) {
1066                        throw new IOException("LineReader is closed");
1067                    }
1068    
1069                    // Read more data if we are at the end of the buffered data.
1070                    // Though it's an error to read after an exception, we will let {@code fillBuf()}
1071                    // throw again if that happens; thus we need to handle end == -1 as well as end == pos.
1072                    if (pos >= end) {
1073                        fillBuf();
1074                    }
1075    
1076                    // è¯•å›¾åœ¨ç¼“å­˜ä¸­æ‰¾LFï¼ˆæ¢è¡Œï¼‰ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°ï¼Œå°±è¿”å›
1077                    for (int i = pos; i != end; ++i) {
1078                        if (buf[i] == LF) {
1079                            int lineEnd = (i != pos && buf[i - 1] == CR) ? i - 1 : i;
1080                            String res = new String(buf, pos, lineEnd - pos, charset.name());
1081                            pos = i + 1;
1082                            return res;
1083                        }
1084                    }
1085    
1086                    // Let's anticipate up to 80 characters on top of those already read.
1087                    ByteArrayOutputStream out = new ByteArrayOutputStream(end - pos + 80) {
1088                        @Override
1089                        public String toString() {
1090                            int length = (count > 0 && buf[count - 1] == CR) ? count - 1 : count;
1091                            try {
1092                                return new String(buf, 0, length, charset.name());
1093                            }
1094                            catch (UnsupportedEncodingException e) {
1095                                // ç”±äºæˆ‘ä»¬å·²ç»è®¾ç½®äº†å­—ç¬¦ç¼–ç ï¼Œæ‰?»¥è¿™ä¸ªä¸ä¼šå‘ç”Ÿ
1096                                throw new AssertionError(e);
1097                            }
1098                        }
1099                    };
1100    
1101                    while (true) {
1102                        out.write(buf, pos, end - pos);
1103                        // Mark unterminated line in case fillBuf throws EOFException or IOException.
1104                        end = -1;
1105                        fillBuf();
1106    
1107                        // è¯•å›¾åœ¨ç¼“å­˜ä¸­æ‰¾LFï¼ˆæ¢è¡Œï¼‰ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°ï¼Œå°±è¿”å›
1108                        for (int i = pos; i != end; ++i) {
1109                            if (buf[i] == LF) {
1110                                if (i != pos) {
1111                                    out.write(buf, pos, i - pos);
1112                                }
1113                                pos = i + 1;
1114                                return out.toString();
1115                            }
1116                        }
1117                    }
1118                }
1119            }
1120    
1121            /**
1122             * è¯»å–ä¸?º›å†…å®¹åˆ°bufä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚æœpos==endæˆ–è?end==-1ï¼ŒæŠ›å¼‚å¸¸
1123             * 
1124             * @throws IOException
1125             */
1126            private void fillBuf() throws IOException {
1127                int result = in.read(buf, 0, buf.length);
1128                if (result == -1) {
1129                    throw new EOFException();
1130                }
1131                pos = 0;
1132                end = result;
1133            }
1134        }
1135    
1136    }
